overview: There is something to be said about being young, in control, and growing up to be a nice respectable woman. Then there is also something to be said about those young girls that don't give a shit about being respected. All they want is to be totally out of control and fuck the shit out of any guy they meet. Fuck studying for finals, or even care what the future will bring. Just be here now and party till you drop. Now that's the type of girl I want to have around.
title: Young & Seriously Out Of Control
